text:
@GavinNewsom Men died in wars for freedoms being tossed away by the self-obsessed for political lies.

CA COVID infections = 0.53% of population, that's ZERO% - that all but most fragile RECOVER FROM!

=NO PANDEMIC, NO NEED FOR MASKS or SHUT-DOWN

#COVID19 #coronavirus #Corona #MaskUp
